name: Yummybay.com
tag_list: online-food-ordering-india, restaurant-food-guide, restaurant-directory, restaurant-menus, table-booking-services-india, home-delivery-india
overview:
Yummybay.com is an online food ordering portal that allows the customers to order food from over 1500 restaurants and also offers variety of options that include book a table, cakes, corporate bookings, caterers and gift a food. Customers can avail this option either through cash on delivery or through credit or debit cards. Launched in Kerala, the site has been operational since 2nd October 2010; we have already listed over 1500 restaurants serving 50000+ dishes in over 40 different cuisines.Yummybay.com is currently operational in Bangalore, Chennai & Kerala and has the expertise of processing bulk amount of orders a day. We have exclusive relations with large corporate and MNCâ€™s providing them online food ordering and assisting them in corporate table bookings and catering services.

Yummy Bay developed by Amicitia Food Mart Pvt Ltd helps you take ordering food to a technologically advanced and yet the simplest form of online ordering. Our group with its long term experience in ecommerce industry felt the requisite for online ordering and knew that it would be necessary for restaurants to offer this kind of service in future. With utmost care and service provided to our customers, we shall also strive to establish successful lasting relationships with our clients. In short we help take the process of ordering food to a much simpler, accurate and fast pace via the internet letting you to feel secure with the services provided and to build loyalty that makes you come back for more.

Yummybay has been portrayed as the one which offers holistic food solutions for online customers in South India. Yummybay is planning to expand all over India and is looking offer its service to more than 100 million users in India. Yummybay will soon be launching its mobile application to target the ever growing mobile internet users. With only a 8% penetration of internet users the online industry is a booming one and the ecommerce market is likely to grow at 40% rate from the 42,000 Cr e-commerce industry.

Mission Our mission is to serve 10 million foodies by the end of 2012, and to become a holistic food solution partner to all our customers.

Vision We aim at a holistic development in the food and hospitality industry, wherein we give an enormous exposure to hotels and resorts, with our services that enable an enquiry system, for a remarkable user experience.
